assignments.title: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
assignments.description: Research and explain Newton’s Laws of Motion in the context of rocket propulsion. Provide real-world examples.

assignments.title: Propellant Chemistry Analysis
assignments.description: Compare solid, liquid, and hybrid propellants. Discuss their advantages, disadvantages, and use cases.

assignments.title: Rocket Engine Design Project
assignments.description: Design a basic rocket engine using theoretical calculations. Include thrust, specific impulse, and nozzle design.

assignments.title: Airfoil Design and Lift Generation
assignments.description: Simulate airfoil shapes and analyze how they generate lift. Provide explanations with sketches.

assignments.title: Wind Tunnel Experiment Report
assignments.description: Use CFD software or a physical experiment to study airflow around objects. Write a report on turbulence and drag.

assignments.title: Aerodynamic Stability in Supersonic Flight
assignments.description: Research how aircraft maintain stability at supersonic speeds. Present case studies of hypersonic vehicles.

assignments.title: Spacecraft Structural Analysis
assignments.description: Study spacecraft materials and analyze trade-offs between weight, strength, and thermal resistance.

assignments.title: Satellite Orbital Mechanics
assignments.description: Calculate orbital parameters for a satellite in Low Earth Orbit (LEO). Provide velocity and fuel calculations.

assignments.title: Mars Mission Proposal
assignments.description: Design a conceptual spacecraft for a Mars mission. Outline propulsion, power, and life support systems.

assignments.title: Reaction Mechanisms
assignments.description: Illustrate and explain SN1, SN2, E1, and E2 reactions. Provide examples and reaction conditions.

assignments.title: Spectroscopy in Organic Chemistry
assignments.description: Analyze IR, NMR, and Mass Spectrometry data for given compounds. Identify functional groups.

assignments.title: Synthesis of a Pharmaceutical Drug
assignments.description: Outline the synthesis steps for aspirin or ibuprofen. Explain the role of reagents and catalysts.

assignments.title: Coordination Complexes
assignments.description: Analyze the structure and bonding of transition metal complexes. Discuss applications in catalysis and medicine.

assignments.title: Crystal Field Theory
assignments.description: Explain Crystal Field Theory and predict the electronic configurations of different metal complexes.

assignments.title: Synthesis of an Inorganic Compound
assignments.description: Synthesize and characterize an inorganic compound. Provide reaction mechanisms and spectroscopic analysis.

assignments.title: Thermodynamics and Free Energy
assignments.description: Derive and analyze Gibbs free energy equations for chemical reactions.

assignments.title: Quantum Chemistry Applications
assignments.description: Apply quantum mechanics to predict molecular orbitals. Solve Schrödinger’s equation for a hydrogen atom.

assignments.title: Reaction Kinetics Experiment
assignments.description: Design an experiment to measure reaction rates and determine activation energy using Arrhenius plots.

course_name: Ancient Languages and Scripts of Middle-earth

assignments.title: Elvish Writing and Phonetics
assignments.description: Translate an English passage into Tengwar (Elvish script). Provide pronunciation rules.

assignments.title: The Role of Language in Culture
assignments.description: Compare Elvish and Dwarvish scripts with real-world ancient scripts. Discuss linguistic influences.

assignments.title: Deciphering Middle-earth Inscriptions
assignments.description: Analyze key inscriptions from Lord of the Rings. Explain grammar and meaning.

course_name: Wizards, Elves, and Men: Inter-species Diplomacy in Middle-earth

assignments.title: The Council of Elrond Analysis
assignments.description: Analyze the Council of Elrond and its diplomatic significance. Discuss the roles played by different races and the challenges in reaching a consensus.

assignments.title: War of the Last Alliance Report
assignments.description: Research and write a report on the War of the Last Alliance. Discuss the political and diplomatic efforts that led to the formation of the alliance against Sauron.

assignments.title: Gandalf’s Role as a Mediator
assignments.description: Examine Gandalf's role as a diplomatic mediator between races. Provide examples from 'The Lord of the Rings' where he fosters unity among different factions.
